problem_text:
8.12.
Let D0 denote the class of finite groups of deficiency zero, i. e. having a presentation ⟨X | R⟩ with |X| = |R|.
a) Does D0 contain any 3-generator p-group for p ⩾ 5?
c) Do soluble D0-groups have bounded derived length?
d) Which non-abelian simple groups can occur as composition factors of D0-groups?
D. L. Johnson, E. F. Robertson
